CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( SummaryType__c , "WalletSizing") || ISPICKVAL( SummaryType__c , "None") || ISPICKVAL( SummaryType__c , "ActualNI") || ISPICKVAL( SummaryType__c , "AdjustedNI") || ISPICKVAL( SummaryType__c , "TotalCompanyNI") , NIIc__c + NIId__c + Fee__c ,IF( ISPICKVAL( SummaryType__c , "ExpectedIncrementalNI") || ISPICKVAL( SummaryType__c , "ExpectedIncrementalNIStep5") ,NIIc__c + NIId__c + TFFee__c + FXFee__c + LGFee__c + CashFee__c + ASFee__c + CreditFee__c + BAFee__c + DerivativeFee__c + IBFee__c,0 ))
CustomField.label: GrandTotal
